All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Advance
Implemented Command pattern.
AdvanceTest
This class is used to test functionality of Advance order.
Airlift
The execute and validation of Airlift is handle by this class.
AirliftTest
This class is used to test the functionalities of Airlift class methods.
Blockade
This blockade class is used to neutral one of the territories of the player and triplet the number of armies on that territory.
BlockadeTest
This class is used to test the functionalities of Airlift class methods.
Bomb
When player use this Bomb card on target country then target country will lose half of their armies.
BombTest
This class is used to test the functionalities of Bomb class methods.
Card
This interface handles all the card that player can have
Command
Class takes input commands from user.
CommandControllerTestSuite
Test suite for testing StartUp phase and OrderExecution Phase
CommandTest
This CommandsTest class file is used to test some important functionalities of Command file
CommonUtil
Common Utility class that checks all null/empty strings, objects and collections.
Continent
Model class that manages all the continents on the provided map.
ContinentTest
This ContinentTest class file is used to test some important functionalities of Continent file
Country
Model class that manages all the countries on the provided map.
CountryTest
This CountryTest class file is used to test some important functionalities of Country file
Deploy
Implemented Command pattern.
DeployTest
This CountryTest class file is used to test some important functionalities of Country file
Diplomacy
This class is used to handle Diplomacy command
DiplomacyTest
This class is used to test the functionalities of Diplomacy class methods.
ExceptionLogHandler
A class for logging uncaught exceptions not handled by try/catch blocks
GameConstants
This class is used to initialise all the constants that are going to be used throughout the code base.
GameConstantsTest
This ApplicationConstantsTest class file is used to test some important functionalities of ApplicationConstants file
GameEngine
This serves as the starting point for the game and manages the current state of the game.
GameEngineTest
This class is used to test functionality of GameEngineController class functions.
GameState
Model class to manage the GameState functions
InvalidCommand
This class throws Invalid Command Exceptions
InvalidMap
This class throws Invalid Map Exceptions
IssueOrderPhase
Implementation of Issue Order Phase class for GamePlay using State Pattern.
LogEntryBuffer
The class records and stores logs for different phases of the game
LogWriter
The class updates the log file containing entries obtained from the LogEntryBuffer Class.
MainGameTestSuite
Test suite for testing player services of adding players, assigning armies and countries
Map
Model class to manage the uploaded maps
MapService
The MapService class is used to load, read, parse, edit and the save map file.
MapServiceTest
This MapServiceTest class file is used to test some important functionalities of MapService file
MapTest
This MapTest class file is used to test some important functionalities of Mapservice file
MapTestSuite
Test suit for running command such as load map, edit,map validations country, continents and save map
MapView
This is MapView class for displaying and accessing maps.
MapViewTest
This MapViewTest class file is used to test some important functionalities of MapView file
Order
This Class handles command which is given by the player.
OrderExecutionPhase
Order Execution Phase implementation for the game using State Pattern.
OrderExecutionPhaseTest
This class is used to test the functionalities of OrderExecutionPhase class methods.
OrderTest
This Ordertest class file is used to test some important functionalities of order file
Phase
This abstract class declares abstract methods for each game phase
Player
This class depicts the player information and services.
PlayerService
This service is used for handle the players.
PlayerServiceTest
This playerServiceTest class file is used to test some important functionalities of playerservice file
PlayerTest
Test cases to validate functionality of player class
StartUpPhase
Implementation of Startup Phase class for GamePlay using State Pattern.
TestSuiteRunner
Test suit for running all test suites involved in this game project
